message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.CV, cs.CL 

The paper proposes a mechanism to address catastrophic forgetting in neural networks, which is a common problem in machine learning and artificial intelligence. The proposed mechanism involves a task-based hard attention mechanism, which is a technique used in deep learning and computer vision. Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing), cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition), and cs.CL (Computation and Language).
